Functions

int LRC_textParser (FILE *read, char *SEP, char *COMM, LRC_configNamespace *configSpace, LRC_configTypes *ct, int numCT)
 Reads config file, namespaces, variable names and values, into the options structure.
int LRC_hdfParser (hid_t file, LRC_configNamespace *cs, LRC_configTypes *ct, int numCT)
 Parse config data stored in HDF5 files.

Detailed Description

Currently there are two parsers available:

  • Text file parser
    See also:
    LRC_textParser()
  • HDF5 file parser
    See also:
    LRC_hdfParser()
    Todo:
    Add secondary separator support.

Function Documentation

Parse config data stored in HDF5 files.

HDF5 parser

Parameters:
file The handler of the file.
cs Pointer to the structure of config data.
ct Pointer to the structure with allowed datatypes.
numCT Number of allowed datatypes.
Returns:
Number of read namespaces.

char *  SEP,
char *  COMM,

LRC_configTypes *  ct,

)

Reads config file, namespaces, variable names and values, into the options structure.

Text parser

See also:
LRC_configNamespace.
Parameters:
read Handler of the config file to read.
SEP The separator name/value.
COMM The comment mark.
configSpace Pointer to the structure with config file data.
ct Pointer to the structure with datatypes allowed in the config file.
numCT Number of datatypes allowed in the config file.
Returns:
Number of namespaces found in the config file on success, -1 otherwise.
Todo:
Check if the namespace is allowed.
